Posts.Content: jojo02 wrote: Is there a "magic" word to get a biopsy.  I have a mass behind the nipple that shows on mammo,us,CT and MRI...the radiologist says it's been there a few years no need to worry.  I don't care,I want a biopsy.  I tried to self refer myself and they won't do anything without the radiologist saying ok she needs it.  Is there something I can say that will get someone's attention?  Surely somewhere someone has had this problem. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Help Getting a Biopsy jojo02 nash
